references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a model that is foundational to many image-related tasks, and is directly leveraged for qualitative evaluation in this work.

references.paper_title: Light field networks: Neural scene representations with single-evaluation rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of neural radiance fields, a key concept in 3D reconstruction that is extended to 4D in this work.

references.paper_title: LRM: Large reconstruction model for single image to 3d
references.reason: This paper introduces LRM, a foundational large-scale 3D reconstruction model, which this paper builds upon for 4D reconstruction.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces Gaussian splatting, the 3D representation used in this work, and details the associated real-time rendering techniques.

references.paper_title: LGM: Large multi-view gaussian model for high-resolution 3d content creation
references.reason: This paper introduces LGM, a large multi-view Gaussian model, which is directly extended and used as the basis for the 4D reconstruction model presented in this paper.
